title: Drawing, Sketchbook Page: Facade of 14th Century Building, Bologna; Verso: Monument and Anatomical Study, 1811–14
title_raw: Sketchbook Page: Facade of 14th Century Building, Bologna; Verso: Monument and Anatomical Study
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 6; monumento quattro cento; 7 solare; 8 molevole.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Heavily decorated facade; view of church door seen through arch or gateway. Verso: part of left leg shown before baptismal fountain. Leg inscribed 6.  Inscription next to fount: monumento quattro cento.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Sketchbook Page: Facade of 14th Century Building, Bologna; Verso: Monument and Anatomical Study, 1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2437
